content: fall is here and what better way to welcome the season than with a cute crochet acorn bag to carry with you on your daily adventures with this whimsical design you can step into nature and feel like one of the woodland creatures stylish and ready to frolic among the trees **materials** ▢caron one pound - dove ▢red heart - cafe latte ▢red heart - medium thyme ▢5 mm hook ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** magic_ring - magic_ring chains - chain single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet triple crochet - treble_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch increase - increase decrease - decrease back loop only - blo special stitches bobble crab
